name: Love waifu #37 - Exhausted Angel
description: Sweat glistens between her breasts as she sprawls back, her toned thighs falling open just enough to tease. The damp fabric of her shorts clings to her swollen folds, the outline of her arousal impossible to ignore. Her fingers toy with the hem, dragging it up inch by torturous inch—testing how badly you want to see *more*.

attributes.value: The "Love Waifu" collection is a series of unique digital artworks featuring anime-style female characters in diverse emotional states and situations. Each NFT heroine isn't just a character — she's a moment suspended between temptation, vulnerability, and playful power. Enter a world where a single look can say more than any line of dialogue.
